page.title: 14ETTRICK VALLEY SERVICES.
page.content: The valley of Ettrick is about 18 miles away from Selkirk our closest town and because we are so remote all the services we get have to come a long way. On Monday,Wednesday and Friday the Milkman comes from Galashiels 27miles away selling milk,cream and bread. On Wednesday the Baker comes 19miles from Hawick,he sells bread,cakes and groceries. Each week on a rota a Postman brings post and papers 18miles from Selkirk to the families in the valley. Once a fortnight on Friday a Library Van comes 27miles from Galashiels in the van there are shelves with books for people with different tastes. On a Tuesday a courier bus takes the people who need transport to Ettrick- bridge where another bus takes them to Selkirk.
